title: UNO Physical Card Game
desc: What's better than a face to face battle?
features: Around ten euro at Easons
Sit around table with family and friends
In person, communicative and social
As many players as the deck allows
House rules up to players

title: UNO and Friends (mobile)
desc: Play on the go with people from all over the world!
features: Free to play mobile game
Ingame currency used to join tournaments
Essentially gambling
Customsiable avatars, pets, card designs
Offers cosmetics to engage the player and gain money
Brand deals, crossovers with major brands
Rules are set by developers, may be strange to player

title: Blackjack Physical Card Game
features: Uses standard set of cards
Cheap, less than five euro
Social, in person
2 players only
No money involved, purely fun
Fair, as players can set rules themselves

title: Blackjack Casino Style
features: Usually in a gambling setting
Uses casino tokens rather than real money
Hides the fact real money is being used
In person, not as social
Multiple players with a casino dealer
Questionable morals, fairness
Rules are set by casino, may be strange to player

title: Monopoly Board Game
features: Board game based on dice rolls
Consists of game board
Physical money, houses and hotels
Various types of boards, collabs with other companies (Mario, Nintendo)
Social, in person sitting around a table
One player acts as a banker and controls money

title: Monopoly Console Game
desc: The famous board game hits the big screen!
features: Digital game
Code controls board, houses, money instead of a dealer
Social in the means of voice chat, but not face to face
In game purchases such as DLC
DLC offers new boards, cosmetics etc.
